RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTTAGETITBACK rallied into upper stretch being blocked along the inside there angling out to split horses mid stretch surging clear gamely. UNBRIDLEDSELECTION angled out on the turn racing seven wide down the lane coming on late. SPEEDY MOONLITE chased the pace to upper stretch extending in the three path staying on to the wire. FLYUNDERTHEGRAYDAR away alertly set the pace through the turn being hooked between horses in upper stretch drifting in a touch to the two path weakening late. JULIE'S FERRARI rallied on the turn losing momentum in upper stretch finsihing evenly at mid track. MASKED pressed early then weakened on the turn. CZECHMIGHT a step slow throughout raced eight wide down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridledselection
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Navy Chief's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out on turn, 7 wide lane, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Masked
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, weakened on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied from turn, blocked upper stretch, split horses gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Flyunderthegraydar
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked between lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Czechmight
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 8 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Moonlite
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, extended three path lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied turn, 5 wide lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 26 Allowed 3 lbs. C laiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEDERALE well placed stalked the pace through the far turn looming outside the pacesetter in upper stretch engaging late edging clear in the final yards. BUTTON BOX away alertly set the pace carrying daylight to upper stretch digging to late pressure ceding grudgingly at the end. HARTEL slow early circled out on the far turn vying from mid track down the lane finding best stride late. AMICUS BRIEF raced evenly saving ground to upper stretch finishing well along the inside. ELVIRUS raced mid apck cutting the corner to contention in upper stretch hanging late along the rail. PANORAMA TRUCK raced evenly through the far turn weakening six wide down the lane. ZERO FOR CONDUCT had little response. GOTTSACKER stalked the pace to the far turn wearing down into upper stretch. TRIGZ TOO was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Button Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, dug in to upper stretch, grudgingly late

ENTRY.NAME: Hartel
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, came on late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Amicus Brief
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside to lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Trigz Too
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Federale
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, loomed upper stretch, surged clear in the final yard

ENTRY.NAME: Elvirus
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, cut corner to lane, hung on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Panorama Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, weakened 6 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gottsacker
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled close up, tracked through far turn, wore out lane

ENTRY.NAME: Zero for Conduct
ENTRY.COMMENT: had little response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEDDING BOURBON away alertly set the pace shaking clear into upper stretch winning as much the best. MAYSVILLE MISS pressured early then chased through the turn then down the stretch a solid second best. RUN KITTY faded on the turn recovering somewhat to improve position with an even finish. QUITCHERSNIVELIN played no factor. TEQUILA SUNSET was never involved. KELSEY'S ANGEL raced evenly through the turn tiring down the stretch.

ENTRY.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Metropolitan Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn, regrouped lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased turn, no match lane, second best

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Wedding Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened upper stretch, nuch the best

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 26, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claimin g Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARLIE Q BLUE sent clear set the pace on moderate splits to the far turn, opening up at the head of the lane winning as much the best. MANHATTAN LADY raced evenly through the turn emerging off a loose leader in upper stretch responding as a clear second best. MALIBU MARLEE slow early lagged to upper stretch passing a few late. LOVE TO ZOOM gave a modest move on the far turn racing evenly along the inside down the lane. COURTED raced evenly proving no menace. FLECK was always outrun. FIANNA HILLS stalked the pace through the far turn then gave way in upper stretch.

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURESKIS pressed the pace dueling abreast through the turn into upper stretch bearing down to edge clear late. KNOCKOUT GUY brushed at the break was slow early floated out on the turn coming five wide in upper stretch rallying late to save place. DANG IT CAIN prompted the pace dueling along the inside down the stretch ceding late. MOON OVER DUBAI gave hard pursuit through the turn extending four wide down the lane coming up a bit short. ANDYLITHIC pressed between early then chased on the turn weakening along the inside the final eighth. CALIFORNIA EMERALD was never involved. ANGELA'S ANGEL brushed at the break would trail throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, floated out on turn, 5 wide lane, came on late

ENTRY.NAME: Angela's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Andylithic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between then chased on turn, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, bit short

ENTRY.NAME: Dang It Cain
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, dueled inside lane, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: California Emerald
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Tureskis
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast lane, drew clear late

Non-winners Of A Race Since June 26 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORIED FELLA saved ground rallying to upper stretch clearing late along the rail. FULL AHEAD set the pace dueling on the turn digging in from mid track in upper stretch ceding grudgingly to inside pressure. FIFTEEN TO VEGAS chased the pace pressing on the turn dueling in upper stretch being outfinished.
